name: Jurassic Escape: Dino Sim 2018
description:
What was that noise? The herd is starting to move! There are dinosaurs running in every direction: It's a stampede! Choose your favorite dinosaur and travel with the group. But be careful not to hit anyone, it would take health points from you!
Try to move forward as fast as you can and earn points for going quick. The longer you go on your maximum speed, the more points you'll get! When you find someone on your way, just roar and they'll step aside!

Will you be able to survive? Only time will say.

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- Daily Rewards
- 7 Unlockable Dinosaurs
- Unlockable Game Modes
- Custom Difficulty
- Custom Weather
